amendment.description: An amendment numbered 146 printed in the Congressional Record to strike from Page 2, line 22, "that is" and insert "that has been drawn down during the period beginning January 21, 2021, and ending on the date of enactment of this Act, that is".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A074) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Mr. Pallone raised a point of order against the Greene (GA) amendment (A074). Mr. Pallone stated that the provisions of the amendment exceeds the scope of the bill and the amendment is therefore, not germane. Point of order overruled by the Chair.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A074) offered by Ms. Greene (GA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A074) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
